page.title: 19Bashley Caravan Park.
page.content: Each year thousands of people visit the New Forest and tourism now forms an important part of the area's economy. Caravans and caravaning are popular with many of the visitors. Bashley Caravan Park is a large well organised site covering 112 acres of grass and woodland. Its facilities include 2 swimming pools, adventure playground, tennis courts, shop and a large restaurant and bar. Plans are underway for a 9 hole par 3 golf course. 400 touring caravans can be accommodated on the site. There are a similar number of static vans and chalets. Visitors to the park come from all over Britain and other European Countries and in the peak weeks can number around 4000. 25 permanent staff work in the park with another 45 people taken on sometimes.
